results.name: a(n) = A256487(n)/2 = (A254100(n) - A219178(n))/2.
comment: Half the difference between the least nonludic number removed at the n-th stage of Ludic sieve and the least unlucky number removed at the n-th stage of Lucky sieve.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..933
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 01 2015
